QuestData.Title: The Friend of My Enemy
QuestData.Description: Hallvalor is the ancestral home of the Burning Blade clan. Since they're such fast friends, the Warsong have allowed the blademasters to remain in Nagrand.$B$BWe are fierce, but we won't win if the Burning Blade attack us. It would be wise to strike first.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill $1oa Burning Blade forces at Hallvalor.
QuestData.RewardText: A great victory over the Burning Blade!$B$BThis new Warlord Azuka Bladefury sounds formidable. We will have to keep an eye on her and her blademasters.

Objectives.Objective: Burning Blade forces at Hallvalor slain
